correct_text:
| Maximum key lifetime (SRTP)  | 2^48 packets                       |
   | Maximum key lifetime (SRTCP) | 2^31 packets                       |
notes: RFC 3711 and RFC 7714 specifies different maximum key lifetime values for SRTP and SRTCP (2^48 and 2^31). Additionally word "Default" suggests that higher values are also allowed, what may lead to two-time pad vulnerability for a very long streams.
